CHAT.comment: computer box makes noise as mom touches the top of it, she withdraws her hand quickly and mom and child look at each other and laugh and child touches at the same spot as mother and nothing happens, both are surprised by this.
child touches top of computer box again and it makes noise.
mom touches opening on the front of computer box, it sounds, and mom and child gasp and laugh and child touches box.
mom and child speak simultaneously
mom moves hand over sensor and the computer box makes noises.
computer box sounds.
child and mom laugh and make noises after each noise the computer box makes.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
tape is cut off when child is in the bathroom.
INV brings in robodog.
child picks up robodog and brings it to mom and mom talks to robodog.
child and mom gasp when robodog begins to bark.
child and mom laugh when child tries to force the robodog to sit.
child picks up the robodog and brings him to mom and mom talks to robodog.
mom moves the meerkat and makes noises for it.
child puts meerkat on her head and it topples to the ground.
mom moves animal towards child while making noises.
child is barely visible behind the aquarium and is difficult to understand.
child gets down on the floor and acts like an animal going after mom and child talks for meerkat.
child and meerkat “fight” to get the meerkat off the radiator.
child laughs as mom does the same thing again.
child lifts shirt and mom tickles child with meerkat.
child imitates on mom what mom had done with the meerkat and child.
child makes strange noises as she's doing this.
child shrugs her shoulders and child takes meerkat away from mom and makes it “nibble” on her face.
mom makes meerkat “nibble” on her fingers.
child screams as mom tickles her with the meerkat's nose.
mom rolls the car into the sleeping child.
child laughs as they roll the car between them.
mom puts a chair in the path of the car.
mom puts all three chairs in a line.
mom and child put all chairs except for the green one back around the table.
child moves the red chair in a line with the green chair.
mom moves the green chair back to the table.
child laughs as she looks in the mirror.
mom lifts the front hood of the car.
INV takes the car out of the room.
child stands on a chair to look in the top of the tank.
mom whispers to child.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child whispers a couple of sentences that are inaudible.
INV brings in the degu and mom gasps and INV laughs.
mom and child stick fingers in cage and explore outside of cage.
child is pushing on top of cage like a doorbell.
it's difficult to hear child because her voice is muffled by the cage.
child shakes the top part of the cage while talking to the degu.
child shakes the top part of the cage vigorously.
child walks to the other side of the cage and table.
child yells and laughs.
